{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BT |model=Home Hub |revision=4A |serialnum_prefix=068340 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00DC1SJPW;GB; |price= |est_release_date=05/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RTA7405W |manuf_rev=-D18 (rev 8.0) |availability=now |type=CPE, wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 50368;XWAY ARX368 (PSB 50368 EL); |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08UOD-BIB0 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D1G1664A-2.5B |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 50368;XWAY ARX368 (PSB 50368 EL); |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 82312;XWAY WRX312 (PSB 82312 EL); |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi2_chip1_model=PSB 8231 |wi2_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi2_chip2_model=PSB 8301 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF7071V |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=BTHub4-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BTHub4-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.productsandservices.bt.com/products/broadband/wireless-hub-router Product page] :[http://www.shop.bt.com/products/bt-home-hub-4--bt-broadband-customers--8P1M.html On '''shop.bt.com''']
*{{WPLink|BT_Home_Hub}} *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/bt/homehub_v4a ''BT Home Hub 4A'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
[[BT Home Hub]] *'''BT Home Hub 4 (Type A)''' - CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 50368 (068340) *'''BT Home Hub 4 (Type B)''' - CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 (068341)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.ispreview.co.uk/index.php/2013/05/uk-isp-bt-retail-reveals-new-smarter-hub-3-broadband-wireless-router.html ''BT New Smarter Hub 4 Broadband Wireless Router'' on '''ISPreview'''] :[[Lantiq]] XWAY ARX368 (PSB 50368 EL) @500MHz MIPS 34Kc :[http://www.lantiq.com/digital-home/dsl-gateways/adsl2-wi-fi-router/gigabit-ethernet-adsl-router/ ''Lantiq ARX368'' based] w/ ''WAVE 300'' radio 2T2R 802.11bgn
Additional specifications, per ''BT'', follow... *Ethernet: 1x GbE WAN, 4x LAN (3x FE (LAN1-3), 1x GbE (LAN4)) *Dimension (HxWxD): [[Dimensions::116 mm x 236 mm x 31 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::301 g]]
The image provided by '''BT''' indicates the default SSID pattern is :'''BTHub4-XXXX''' (''XXXX'' being upper case letters and numbers)
===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.kitz.co.uk/index.php?topic=12491.0 On '''Kitz.co.uk''' forums] *[http://forums.thinkbroadband.com/fibre/4236386-new-bt-home-hub-4-with-dual-band-wifi.html?fpart=all&vc=1 On '''ThinkBroadband''' forums]
==Images== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/bt/homehub_v4a#pcb_photos ''PCB photos'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
